short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create, search, review, and share interviews as you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create, search, review, and share your Spark Hire interviews.

Use the extension to take Spark Hire with you as you browse the web.

Once the extension is installed and you connect to your Spark Hire account, you'll be able to:

- Search for interviews
- Invite candidates to new interviews
- Access interview results and click to watch
- Share interviews

For customers that have a bunch of tabs open at a time, the Spark Hire extension will simplify your workflow as you're always a single click away from your interviews.

By installing this extension, you agree to the Spark Hire Terms of Use and Privacy and Security Policy at https://www.sparkhire.com/terms and https://www.sparkhire.com/privacy respectively.
